edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.audio

Class Music

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.audio.Music

  • public class Music
extends java.lang.Object
    Music class: creates a audio clip given a file URL, and has options for playing and stopping the clip from playing.
    Author:
    Matt Du
